channel.title: Edge Collective
channel.description: Working collectively, at large and small scales, to prepare for the future.
channel.itunes:author: Don Blair
channel.itunes:summary: Working collectively, at large and small scales, to prepare for the future.

item.title: 1. Decentralized water treatment using biochar; the role of low-cost UV instrumentation.
item.description: In this episode Don muses about biochar-based water filters, how they might be useful in decentralized water infrastructure, and recent work with Mike on a related UV spectrophotometry device.
